text:
Food was served pretty quickly as we were one of the first customers. The medium gyudon that we ordered is frankly quite tasteless. Have to add plentiful chilli flakes and pickles to work. Egg was too cooked and so were the rice mushy and clumpy.
Yakiniku XL is much better very generous beef. However the egg was again over cooked the egg yolk was solid and rice was overcooked as well. See last photo. Very good value always but it's a shame as we have had better at other outlets. Not sure if it's because we were the first customers of the day?

We always there when we don’t know what to eat, sukiya never fail us. Food served fast, taste always have their standard. Staff are nice and friendly.
Just 1 point that restaurant recently have a bit weird smell when we enter. Hopefully they can have a big cleaning so the restaurant will smell good again.

I have always come to this Sukiya branch at Changi City Point! They are always very nice and friendly, and even when i come close to closing time, they always are happy to serve us a hearty meal!
5 out of 5! And great thanks to Indah who we always see at the night shift!
cheese curry is fine. But in my own opinion, if cheese heated more and melt will be better. Maybe I'll try next time～

Always come here after a late work around 8pm.
My favourite pick would be the spring onion Gyudon, well balanced taste! Food is consistent and tasty.

Would pick this place anytime rather than the expensive mediocre kopitiam in this mall.
